meanings.definition: A large marine mammal with long tusks and a thick layer of blubber.
meanings.sent1: Walruses are known for their long tusks and thick blubber.
meanings.sent2: We saw a group of walruses swimming in the ocean.
meanings.sent3: The walruses decided to have a blubber party by the shore.
meanings.sent4: In the icy waters, the walruses resembled tusked giants of the sea.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the walruses basking on the rocks was unforgettable.

meanings.sent1: Look at all those walruses on the beach!
meanings.sent2: The zookeeper fed the walruses their favorite fish.
meanings.sent3: The walruses held a meeting to discuss their next move.
meanings.sent4: The classroom was filled with drawings of walruses.
meanings.sent5: During the trip, we spotted a pod of walruses playing in the water.
